hypothesis_content.title: Negative News Sentiment Reversal Amplification
hypothesis_content.statement: When crypto market shows >3 consecutive days of negative sentiment (Crypto Fear & Greed Index <40) amid NEUTRAL regime, the first 2-hour positive price move with >1.8x average volume will amplify to 4-6% continuation as short-term pessimism exhausts.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Current 'Why Is Crypto Down' narrative creates pessimistic sentiment while fundamentals unchanged. NEUTRAL regime with oversold conditions creates setup for amplified reversal when first buying appears.
entry_conditions: Crypto Fear & Greed Index <40 for 72+ hours
First 2-hour candle closes >1.5% up with volume >1.8x 20-period avg
Funding rates neutral to slightly negative (-0.001% to -0.005%)
Regime: NEUTRAL only (not BEAR or STRESS)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 6% move from entry or Fear & Greed Index >50
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price makes new local low below entry candle
exit_conditions.time_exit: 24 hours if move stalls below 2% gain

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Initial volume spike fails to attract follow-through (next 2 candles <0.8x avg volume)
